title: Dashboard Service
description: This schema defines the Messaging Service entity, such as Kafka and Pulsar.

dashboardServiceType.description: Type of Dashboard service - Superset or Lookr

id.description: Unique identifier of this dashboard service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this dashboard service.

serviceType.description: Type of dashboard service such as Lookr or Superset...

description.description: Description of a dashboard service instance.

dashboardUrl.description: Dashboard Service URL. This will be used to make REST API calls to Dashboard Service

ingestionSchedule.description: Schedule for running metadata ingestion jobs.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this messaging service.
